content: हिरण्यं [हिरणेमव स्वार्थे यत्] {@--1@} Gold; <ls>Ms. 2. 246</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 128.</ls> {@--2@} Any vessel of gold; <ls>Ms. 2. 29.</ls> {@--3@} Silver. {@--4@} Any precious metal. {@--5@} Wealth, property. {@--6@} Semen virile. {@--7@} A {%cowrie%}. {@--8@} A particular measure. {@--9@} A substance. {@--10@} The thorn-apple (धत्तूर). --ण्या One of the seven tongues of fire.
